RelatedSentence: Ukraine has announced that it will lift its embargo on Polish meat , Polish Foreign Minister Radoslaw Sikorski has told Polish Radio .
Ukraine has announced that it will lift its embargo on Polish meat , Polish Foreign Minister Radoslaw Sikorski has told Polish Radio .
Sikorski visited Kiev , Friday , where he spoke with Prime Minister Arseniy Yatsenyuk and Acting President Oleksandr Turchynov .
